Posts.Content: mistymoley Sorry to hear this,  Carole.  At least it's being sorted quickly and your scans will hopefully give you some reassurance that it's localised.  So sorry to hear this, will be thinking about you, good luck with it all.
Posts.Title: Another Lump Update

Posts.Content: Good for you, its the best thing you can do, try Aloe vera Gel on the breast it worked for me.
Posts.Title: I've done it - booked flight
